text: Timeline is a 2003 American science fiction adventure movie. It was directed by Richard Donner and was produced by Lauren Shuler Donner, Jim Van Wyck, and Richard Donner. Timeline was released on November 26, 2003. The movie is based on the novel of the same name by Michael Crichton. The movie gained negative reviews from critics and holds a 12% rating on Rotten Tomatoes. It was also a box office bomb, only earning back $43,935,763 of its $80 million budget. == Cast == * Paul Walker as Chris Johnston * Frances O'Connor as Kate Ericson * Gerard Butler as André Marek * Billy Connolly as Professor Edward A. Johnston * David Thewlis as Robert Doniger * Anna Friel as Lady Claire * Neal McDonough as Frank Gordon * Matt Craven as Steven Kramer * Ethan Embry as Josh Stern * Michael Sheen as Lord Oliver de Vannes * Lambert Wilson as Lord Arnaud de Cervole * Marton Csokas as Sir William De Kere/William Decker * Rossif Sutherland as François Dontelle * Patrick Sabongui as Jimmy Gomez * Steve Kahan as Baker ==References== == Other websites == * Category:2003 action movies Category:2003 science fiction movies Category:2000s American adventure movies Category:American science fiction movies Category:2000s English- language movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Paramount Pictures movies Category:Time travel movies Category:Movies directed by Richard Donner
title: Timeline (movie)
